missingmagic.spellpiece.trick_freeze.des: Freezes the Block at the given Position
missingmagic.spellpiece.trick_freeze_seq: Freezes a sequence of blocks along the direction of the given Vector
missingmagic.spellpiece.trick_torrent_se: Creates a sequence of water along the direction of the given Vector
missingmagic.spellpiece.trick_melt.desc: Melts the Block at the given Position
missingmagic.spellpiece.trick_melt_seque: Melts a sequence of blocks along the direction of the given Vector
missingmagic.spellpiece.operator_vector_: Adds up all the components of the given Vector
Multiplies together all the components of the given Vector
missingmagic.error.range: ERROR: The range of this trick is 32 blocks
